title: 公共辩护人办公室:自5月1日晚上以来,公共辩护人及其代表一直在确定被拘留者的居所
content: 自5月1日晚上以来,检察官及其代表一直在确定被拘留者所在地。根据检察官办公室的说法,目前,检察官的代表已经访问了Tbilisi的Digomi和Avchala拘留中心在行政程序下被拘留的3人,以及不同诊所的集会参与者,“检察官的代表继续访问被拘留者。所有报告滥用/过度使用武力的人将被转移到特别调查局。我们提醒您,检察官办公室的热线 - 14 81 - 24小时工作,每天报告侵权案件。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131258-public-defenders-office-since-may-1-night-public-defender-and-his-representatives-have-been-determining-the-whereabouts-of-the-detainees/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:56

title: Marija Pejčinović Burić:我呼吁格鲁吉亚立法者等待委内瑞拉委员会即将发表的意见 - 透明度不应该被用作侮辱民间社会组织的工具
content: 尽管格鲁吉亚的国际合作伙伴呼吁撤回该法案,但我对格鲁吉亚的发展感到深感关切,“尽管格鲁吉亚的国际合作伙伴呼吁撤回该法案,但在一份声明中,欧洲理事会秘书长玛丽亚·佩奇诺维奇·布里奇(Maria Pejčinović Burić)表示:“鉴于议会对其与欧洲民主和人权标准相兼容性的重大担忧,我呼吁格鲁吉亚立法者等待委内瑞拉委员会即将到来的意见,并在做出任何最终决定之前考虑其建议,“为民间社会和媒体提供有利的环境对于一个充满活力和充分运作的民主是必不可少的。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131259-marija-pejcinovic-buric-i-call-on-georgian-lawmakers-to-wait-for-the-forthcoming-opinion-of-the-venice-commission-transparency-should-not-be-used-as-an-instrument-to-stigmatise-civil-society-organisations/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:55

title: Gert Jan Koopman:特比利斯气候非常紧张,我敦促大家降低温度 - 我明确表示,这项法律是非常有问题的
content: Tbilisi有一个非常紧张的气候。有升级和两极化。我敦促每个人降低温度。这是一个非常不健康的状况, - 欧洲委员会总干事Gert Jan Koopman在与记者在Tbilisi的对话中说,当他回答了关于“外部影响的透明度”法律草案的问题时。根据他的说法,该法律草案在格鲁吉亚的欧洲一体化道路上产生问题,并在最终批准之前,有必要讨论其内容,“我明确表示,该法律在加入道路上非常有问题的。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131261-gert-jan-koopman-tbilisi-has-a-very-tense-climate-i-urge-everyone-to-lower-the-temperature-i-clearly-stated-that-this-law-is-very-problematic/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:55

title: 罗宾·邓尼根:我深感关切,最近几周,格鲁吉亚政府的选择使该国远离其欧大西洋未来

title: 托马斯·哈克尔:今天的格鲁吉亚梦对格鲁吉亚人民和他们对欧洲未来的愿望来说是一个越来越深刻的噩梦

title: Mikheil Botsvadze - ENERGO-PRO 格鲁吉亚再次受到监管委员会的不公平罚款
content: “不幸的是,在欧洲的CPRO的发起人是如此,因为它在过去的Chairman - 这个国家的最高的金融罚款继续被雇用,因为它是Mikvadheilman的投资,因为它在欧洲的Chairman表示,它是过去的金融罚款再次被强加给网络公司,包括在JSC ENERGO-PRO格鲁吉亚控股公司。我们认为这项决定是无可置疑地不公平和不公平的增加。当然,我们将在法院上诉,根据确立的程序,我们已经完全确定,由于客观的审查,罚款的行业将被取消,“Mikheil Botsvadze说,在过去的11年中,该公司被罚款的总额为GERGO-PRO格鲁吉亚控股公司30 000。“在过去的11个月里 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131264-mikheil-botsvadze-energo-pro-georgia-was-unfairly-fined-again-by-the-regulatory-commission/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:53

title: 迈克尔·罗斯:只要有这么勇敢的伟大欧洲人,欧盟不会消失,蒂比利斯现在是真正的欧洲首都
content: 只要有如此勇敢,伟大的欧洲人,欧盟将不会消失,蒂比利斯现在是欧洲的真正的首都, - 德意志联邦议会外交委员会主席迈克尔·罗斯在他的个人推特页面上写到这一点,“只要有如此勇敢,伟大的欧洲人,欧盟不会因为懦弱,懒惰的人和民族主义者消失。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131265-michael-roth-as-long-as-there-are-such-brave-great-europeans-the-european-union-will-not-disappear-tbilisi-is-now-the-real-capital-of-europe/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:53

title: 示威者在英雄广场封锁道路
content: 市民在抗议法案草案“关于外国影响的透明度”的集会期间阻止了从英雄广场到瓦拉齐斯基维的道路,在集会上称之为“打车 - 自由的噪音!”市民自18时起就聚集在一起,他们的目标是彻底打击英雄广场。目前,执法人员正在试图调节道路上的局势,将公民从公路移动到走廊,并允许车辆移动。正如执法人员告诉聚集的公民,阻止公路是非法的,而且只有在集会参与者数量要求的情况下才有可能。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131266-protesters-block-road-on-heroes-square/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:53

title: 捷克外交部长:我谴责所有针对格鲁吉亚抗议者的暴力行为 - 外国影响透明度法不符合格鲁吉亚的欧洲愿望
content: 捷克外交部长Jan Lipavský谴责对格鲁吉亚示威者的暴力行为,他认为“对外国影响的透明度”法案与格鲁吉亚的欧洲愿望不符,“我谴责对格鲁吉亚示威者的一切暴力行为,对外国影响的透明度法案不符合格鲁吉亚的欧洲愿望,和平集会权是格鲁吉亚当局必须尊重的基本人权。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131268-czech-foreign-minister-i-condemn-all-violence-against-the-protesters-in-georgia-the-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-is-not-in-line-with-georgias-european-aspirations/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:52

title: 瑞典外交部长:欧盟已经表明,它支持格鲁吉亚人民的欧洲愿望 - 格鲁吉亚政府应该避免虚假的叙述和激烈的言论
content: 根据瑞典外交部长托比亚斯·比尔斯特罗姆的说法,格鲁吉亚政府应该避免虚假的叙述和激烈的言论。候选人地位是格鲁吉亚的一个历史性的机会,他说:“在过去的几周里,成千上万的格鲁吉亚人走上全国各地的街头,反对所谓的外国影响法案的声音。瑞典正在密切关注这些事件,并谴责对和平抗议者的暴力使用。必须尊重集会自由。通过授予格鲁吉亚候选人地位,欧盟已经表明,它支持格鲁吉亚人民的欧洲愿望。充满活力和独立的民间社会在推进格鲁吉亚的欧盟道路上发挥着关键作用。拟议的立法声明将与格鲁吉亚声明的欧盟野心相矛盾, 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131269-swedish-foreign-minister-the-eu-has-shown-that-it-supports-the-european-aspirations-of-the-georgian-people-the-georgian-government-should-refrain-from-false-narratives-and-inflammatory-rhetoric/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:51

title: 抗议者从议会游行,加入抗议者在英雄广场
content: 参议院附近的集会的参与者加入了英雄广场的集会的参与者,他们受到掌声和掌声欢迎,英雄广场完全瘫痪,执法人员在现场动员,示威者喊道:“格鲁吉亚”,“不对俄罗斯法律!”集会的参与者抗议法案“关于外国影响的透明度”。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131270-demonstrators-march-from-parliament-join-protesters-on-heros-square/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:51

title: 组织者宣布大规模抗议5月11日外国影响透明度法案
content: 反对外界影响透明度法草案的集会组织者宣布5月11日举行大规模示威活动,作为他演讲中指出的集会组织者之一,每个人都应该记住5月11日,所有尚未出来抗议的人都应该来参加集会,“我希望你记住这个日期 - 5月11日。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131271-organizers-announce-large-demonstration-against-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-for-may-11/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:51

title: 外交部:总理被邀请到美国,但在访问之前,议会不得不暂停对外国影响透明度法案的审议,这不符合伙伴关系精神
content: 格鲁吉亚总理被邀请到美国以保留,在访问之前,格鲁吉亚议会不得不暂停对外国影响透明度法案的审议,这不符合伙伴关系精神, - 读外务部声明. 根据该部,格鲁吉亚方面向美国大使提出了详细的解释,“今天,美国大使的声明发布,格鲁吉亚政府的高级官员被邀请到美国,而格鲁吉亚方面拒绝了。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131272-foreign-ministry-the-pm-was-invited-to-the-usa-with-the-reservation-that-before-the-visit-the-parliament-had-to-suspend-the-consideration-of-the-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-which-does-not-correspond-to-the-spirit-of-partnership/ 发布时间: 2024-05-03 11:09:50

title: 伊拉克利·科巴希兹:在格鲁吉亚的现实中,Rikoti Pass项目没有类似之处,因此我们大胆地称之为世纪的项目
content: 亞洲Rikoti Pass項目在格魯吉亞的現實中沒有類似,因此我們大膽地稱這個項目為世紀的項目, - 格魯吉亞總理Irakli Kobakhidze在9公里長的Zestaponi郊區高速公路的開幕式上發表的演說中表示。正如政府領袖指出的那樣,Rikoti通道被認為是國際高速公路發展最具關鍵性和挑戰性的部分,因此所有這些項目都將有助於我們地區的發展,提高人口福祉的品質。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131117-irakli-kobakhidze-the-rikoti-pass-project-has-no-analogues-in-the-reality-of-georgia-therefore-we-boldly-call-this-project-the-project-of-the-century/ 发布时间: 2024-04-27 17:15:25

title: 议会将于4月29日第二次审议《关于外部影响透明度的法案》
content: 根據提交的期限,GEL - 填寫的法規規案例,如果該組織的法規案例中所規定的組織,將於4月29日發表,該組織的議程將包括在第二次閱讀中提交的法案「關於外國影響的透明度」的法案草案的文章-by-article評論。同一委員會的會議已於9點開放。法案草案「關於外國影響的透明度」由議會在4月17日第一閱讀中通過 - 與83票的議案。法案草案「關於外國影響的透明度」在第二次閱讀中也與去年提交的法案草案相同,並在抗議的背景下放棄。法案草案中,任何人將被認為是「對外 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131118-parliament-to-consider-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-in-second-reading-on-april-29/ 发布时间: 2024-04-27 17:15:25

title: 伊拉克利·科巴希兹:非透明的非政府组织曾两次试图在这个国家组织革命
content: 这个不透明的当然是直接的非政府组织在这个国家试图组织革命两次, - 总理伊拉克利·科巴希兹告诉记者,当他谈到法案草案的“透明的外国影响”的情况下。 在该法案的背景下,Kobakhidze也谈到该国的经济形势,并指出,透明性也是加快经济进步的重要条件。 “事实上,在不透明的条件下,非政府组织的活动严重阻碍了国家的进步,我们提醒你,他们的活动的结果是什么。 在2020年至2021年,他们也有两次透明的革命尝试。 这样的事件,当然,阻碍了我们经济的发展。 提醒你,在2020年,他们会加速国家的开放式投票表,然后我们使用了反对派。 这是一个预先计划的经济 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131119-irakli-kobakhidze-non-transparent-ngos-have-tried-to-organize-a-revolution-twice-in-this-country/ 发布时间: 2024-04-27 17:15:25

title: 伊拉克利·科巴希兹:在前一届政府下,移民指标更为严峻 - 边界现在开放,很容易离开国家,人们有诱惑离开国家
content: 在前任欧盟成员国前进的条款下,我们继续前进,移民指标更为严峻, - 总理伊拉克利·科巴希兹说,在谈论GeoStat数据时,移民人数增加了95.6%在2023年。 根据他的说法,经济问题仍然严重,边界开放,很容易离开国家,“仍然有诱惑人们离开国家,搬到另一个国家”。 “如果该国有很多挑战,所以这些挑战中的主要之一是人口统计。 我们需要负面统计数据,无论是在出生和移民方面,这仍然是严重的原因。 至于移民,基本上有两个理由移民。 第一:仍然有巨大的经济差距与欧盟和欧洲国家。 第二:边界是开放的,很容易离开国家和欧盟国家的负面。 我们仍然有三个次落后于德国的生活水平,在 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131120-irakli-kobakhidze-under-the-previous-government-the-migration-indicators-were-much-more-severe-the-borders-are-now-open-and-it-is-easy-to-leave-the-country-there-is-a-temptation-for-people-to-leave-the-country/ 发布时间: 2024-04-27 17:15:24

title: Lelo for Georgia 加入格鲁吉亚非政府组织4月28日宣布的欧洲游行
content: 根据他们的报道,格鲁吉亚梦政府,服务于俄罗斯的利益,计划创建一个局面,表明格鲁吉亚的一部分人口反对融入欧盟,并支持“俄罗斯法律”的欧洲游行。“Lelo是由格鲁吉亚人民的利益和俄罗斯联盟的宪法基础的指导,服务于俄罗斯的利益,并加入欧洲游行宣布的格鲁吉亚非政府组织的一部分在4月28日。我们站在我们国家的公民的旁边,再次和平,清晰和大声地说是对欧洲和俄罗斯法律!Bidzina伊万尼什维利的俄罗斯联盟政府,服务于俄罗斯的公共利益,计划创建一个局面,表明格鲁吉亚人民的一部分是反对融入欧盟和支持欧盟的法律。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131121-lelo-for-georgia-joins-european-march-announced-by-georgian-ngos-for-april-28/ 发布时间: 2024-04-27 17:15:24

title: 特别调查局将内政部工作人员暴露在强制下
content: 2024年2月7日,在巴图米市,被指控的H.V,以解决妻子的就业问题,遇见了他妻子雇用的私人公司的经理,被指控者将受害者放到车里,口头上对他进行调查,并警告他妻子不要要求签署官方警告文件,否则他不会允许受害者生活在巴图米,并会引起问题。此外,被指控者不允许受害者离开车中,并强制调查他返回车中。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131122-special-investigation-service-exposes-employee-of-ministry-of-internal-affairs-to-coercion/ 发布时间: 2024-04-27 17:15:23

title: Khatuna Burkadze – Georgia’s European integration is our historical choice, and our constitutional duty is to achieve European goals.
content: IntroductionToday, a modern Georgia is in the crucial phase of its development. Despite challenges, we should achieve our European and Euro-Atlantic aspirations. Our ancestors, and currently, we are fighting for the European, better future of Georgia. Brave Georgian soldiers sacrificed themselves for this great idea while protecting the country’s territorial integrity and participating in international missions. Years ago, after the collapse of the Soviet Union, Georgia regained its political independence. However, we have to protect our freedom constantly. Regardless of challenges, we have developed strategic ties with our partners. By creating bilateral and multilateral formats with them, we have defined priorities of cooperation that combine the main directions of the country’s development. With their financial assistance, we have implemented reforms on the European and Euro-Atlantic path. Because of the strong willingness of our citizens, the support of our allies, and geopolitical factors, Georgia is now a candidate state of the European Union. Also, Georgia is an aspirant country of NATO. Simultaneously, we have illustrated that we can significantly contribute to ensuring the security of the Euro-Atlantic area. All this creates a vitally important opportunity to achieve more tangible results in the international arena and to create a solid foundation for safeguarding the rights of citizens and for their well-being and development. Therefore, we should not make decisions which will impede this process. We must appropriately use geopolitical opportunities for the European future of Georgia.Three main factors for not adopting the draft law “On Transparency of Foreign Influence” As a result of the legal analysis of the draft law “On Transparency of Foreign Influence”, it can be said that the scope of its regulation includes a wide range of organizations operating in the country. The draft law applies to non-governmental and media organizations with over 20% of annual income from foreign sources. These entities should register as organizations that carry out the interests of a foreign principal. By doing so, it will stigmatize civil and media organizations, regardless of the goals and tasks of these institutions. Specifically, an organization that promotes the improvement of professional skills of youngsters in the regions through training and other professional programs, assists Georgian farmers in using opportunities of the EU market, focuses on programs concerning the protection of cultural heritage, or promotes safeguarding the rights of people with different needs and facilitates the creation of an appropriate environment, or it provides free legal assistance to citizens to protect their fundamental rights and freedoms, or it disseminates information to the public, establishes a platform for critical opinions, is considered an organization carrying out the interests of a foreign principle. These goals indicate that each direction of activity serves the democratic development of the country and contributes to the creation of an environment focused on the protection of human rights and well-being. Article 8 of the draft law allows the state to interfere in the daily activities of non-profit and media organizations without a clearly defined scope. Namely, the Ministry of Justice of Georgia is authorized to provide monitoring to identify the organization carrying out the interests of a foreign principal or to check the fulfilment of any of the requirements of the draft law. The basis for its initiation is 1) the decision of the relevant authorized person of the Ministry of Justice of Georgia; 2) A written statement submitted to the Ministry of Justice of Georgia, which contains information about possible organizations carrying out the interests of a foreign principle. The bill does not define the exact grounds for so-called monitoring. During the inspection, the relevant authorized person of the Ministry of Justice of Georgia has the right to search the personal data of the organization’s employees, which violates the standards of personal data protection because they should be processed within the limitations defined by the law. The so-called monitoring system will violate the freedom of civil and media organizations, and it will not allow them to act independently, which will essentially damage the pluralistic environment and hinder the country’s democratic processes. For example, a critical media outlet can be the real reason for the so-called monitoring. Such approaches can be used by the state against non-governmental organizations, which ultimately leads to the weakening of the independence of these organizations and, in the worst case, causes the termination of the functions of these entities. This process will threaten the democratic development of the country. It requires the implementation of initiatives that will not harm the civil environment but will contribute to its improvement. For democratization, it is essential to ensure a system of checks and balances. The functioning of this is impossible without a free society and the media. That is why this draft law is incompatible with American, and European values, where freedom is the pillar of democracy, development and many opportunities. During the legal analysis of the draft law, the most important task for lawyers is to answer the guiding question: does the draft law comply with the supreme law of the country - the Constitution of Georgia? Compliance with the hierarchy of normative acts is a necessary condition for the viability of any initiative. According to Article 78 of the Constitution of Georgia, the constitutional bodies within the scope of their competences shall take all measures to ensure the full integration of Georgia into the European and Euro-Atlantic structures. The incompatibility of the draft law with European values threatens the achievement of the country’s European and Euro-Atlantic goals and, accordingly, violates the spirit of Article 78 of the Constitution of Georgia. Foreign political contextWe should emphasize again that the support of partners is critically necessary for a small state especially when we have to protect national interests under conditions of occupation and annexation. Statements of our partners regarding the bill deserve attention. In the changed geopolitical situation, their support is an important factor in achieving Georgia’s foreign policy priorities, which requires appreciation and deepening cooperation. Furthermore, their neglect may cause irreparable damage to the country’s European and Euro-Atlantic goals, which are supported by the majority of the Georgian population and are envisaged by the Georgian constitution.The U.S. House of Representatives and Senate have approved $61 billion in aid for Ukraine. It is another clear proof that the victory of Ukraine will become the basis for the transformation of the current international security system. In this system, Georgia, with the support of the United States and other Western partners, should be able to gain an appropriate place with new large-scale projects, outlining new functions. Our country, as a littoral state of the Black Sea, is strategically important in various contexts, including the economic one. Therefore, we should use this historical, geopolitical opportunity to better ensure our national interests.“Gen Z”Youngsters have demonstrated incredible bravery on the path of Georgia’s European integration. This generation makes choices based on an idea because it creates a belief in a better future, which is necessary for unifying the nation. They can defend great ideas and take decisive steps for the European future of Georgia. It gives us hope that we will be able to achieve common goals.ConclusionWe need to move forward to Europe, our historic, strategic choice! It means implementing the nine recommendations to start negotiations with the European Union about accession. Therefore, we should not make decisions that will damage this process. We need a proactive foreign policy to perform constitutional duties, not discussions on approaches inconsistent with European values.Ilia Chavchavadze noted that We have ‘’Fatherland, language and religion’’ and should take care of these three pillars of our identity. Also, we should act according to the inscription of the Georgian Emblem - “Strength in Unity”. With unity, it is possible to achieve a common victory and finally create a solid foundation for the country’s European future.Dr. Khatuna Burkadze - Director of Foreign Policy Studies at ‘’Geocase,’’ Professor, an Alumna of the Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy and the Harvard Negotiation Program, a member of the Governing Board of the U.S. Government Exchange Program Alumni Association of Georgia 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131130-khatuna-burkadze-georgias-european-integration-is-our-historical-choice-and-our-constitutional-duty-is-to-achieve-european-goals/ 发布时间: 2024-04-27 17:15:19

title: 卡贝什维利:不幸的是,政府正在尽一切努力从格鲁吉亚人民身上夺走欧洲的未来 - 我们将前往大城市,我们将讨论为什么这项法律是俄罗斯的
content: 我們在庫塔西舉辦一場戰略會議 - “不對俄羅斯法律,是對歐洲!”格魯吉亞人民的選舉框架是歐洲聯盟,不幸的是,對我們而言,政府正在做任何事情,以從格魯吉亞人民中奪走歐洲未來,格魯吉亞人民的主席Levan Khabeishvili說,“不對俄羅斯人民的選舉是歐洲聯盟,不幸的是,對我們來說,政府從西方夥伴的聲明中清楚地表明,歐洲聯盟不會接受我們,因此,如果我們採取法律的“外部影響的透明性”,我們會在庫塔西舉行一場會議 - “不對俄羅斯法律,是對歐盟的代表,拒絕歐洲聯盟的代表。因此,當然,我們將前往不同的大城市 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131072-levan-khabeishvili-unfortunately-the-government-is-doing-everything-to-take-away-the-european-future-from-the-georgian-people-we-will-go-to-big-cities-and-we-will-have-a-discussion-about-why-this-law-is-russian/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:30

title: 特别调查服务逮捕了一名因在Telegram组上传播隐私照片
content: 刑事执法机构的职员逮捕了一名27岁的男子,因为泄露了私人生活的秘密。根据该服务,调查发现,被告出生于1996年,居住在特比利斯,与受害者出生的2001年出生的女孩有亲密关系,因而被告因嫉妒而在租赁的公寓里遇见。会议期间,受害者自愿与受害者的手机拍摄亲密照片。2024年3月,与被告分手后,受害者女性在社交网络“Instagram”上发布了一张与她的朋友拍摄的照片,因而被告因嫉妒而呼叫并口头虐待她。同样,在同一天,受害者妇女意识到,她的亲密照片,她要求被告删除,被传送到社交网络Telegram2,5 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131073-special-investigation-service-arrests-one-person-for-dissemination-of-photos-depicting-private-life-in-telegram-group/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:30

title: 政府:萨洛米·苏拉比什维利与立陶宛总统讨论了格鲁吉亚正在发生的事件
content: 格鲁吉亚总统扎拉比什维利(Salome Zurabishvili)在与立陶宛总统吉塔纳斯·努塞达(Gitanas Nausėda)的电话交谈中讨论了格鲁吉亚的发展情况,并强调了保持国家稳定的重要性,格鲁吉亚总统的政府传播了报告。格鲁吉亚总统感谢她的立陶宛同行对格鲁吉亚的欧洲愿望的坚定支持,并指出我们的伙伴和朋友对格鲁吉亚人民的欧洲选择的支持非常重要。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131074-administration-salome-zurabishvili-discussed-the-developments-ongoing-in-georgia-with-the-president-of-lithuania/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:29

content: 根据集会组织者们的说法,在内政部的声明之后,禁止封锁公路,今天的抗议可能伴随着某些挑衅。根据青年,集会不会超越言论自由的极限,他们希望警察也会这样做,“我们仍在等待人们的集会。希望,我们会有许多人。我们的抗议是自发的。今天我们也看到了内政部的声明,我们认为有某种形式的挑衅的风险。抗议今天没有开始,也不会结束。它是自发的,但和平和坚定的。我们不会在任何情况下超越表达的框架,我们有很多希望,警察会这样说。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131076-rally-against-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-underway-near-parliament/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:28

content: 然而,今天的自由主义者,以这种身份和信仰为首要的国家,今天的信仰和信仰都受到威胁,“这些是最早的三大支柱,形成了格鲁吉亚的民族认同,自4世纪以来,格鲁吉亚宣布了基督教为国家宗教的攻击,当格鲁吉亚总理伊拉克利·科巴希兹(Irakli Kobakhidze)在其在匈牙利保守派政治行动会议上的演讲中说,“今天的国家和信仰都受到威胁,所以这些都是今天的主要支柱。政府首脑指出,几百年来,格鲁吉亚人为了保护他们的祖国而奋斗并牺牲自己。 几百年来,格鲁吉亚人为了保护他们的祖国,他们的信仰和信仰而牺牲自己。 我们的格鲁吉亚 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131079-irakli-kobakhidze-estate-language-and-faith-these-are-the-three-main-pillars-that-create-the-national-identity-of-georgia/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:27

title: 伊拉克利·科巴希兹:全球进程表明,保护我们几个世纪的传统和民族身份的努力需要进一步加强
content: 世界秩序今天正在发生重大变化。国际环境正在发生变化,应对这些挑战需要协调努力, - 格鲁吉亚总理伊拉克利·科巴希兹在匈牙利保守政治行动会议上发表讲话时说。 正如政府首脑指出的那样,国际环境正在发生变化,应对这些挑战需要协调努力,“对我来说,有机会在保守派政治倡议会议上出现在你们面前,并对该会议的高度尊敬的参与者进行讲话,这是一个巨大的荣誉。 世界秩序今天正在发生重大变化。 国际环境正在发生变化,迎接保守派政治倡议,这些挑战需要协调工作。 然而,通过共同努力,可以帮助我们推动近期和预期的全球进程,以保护我们百年历史的传统和民族身份的努力,需要得到进一步加强。 作为总理 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131080-irakli-kobakhidze-global-processes-show-that-efforts-to-protect-our-centuries-old-traditions-and-national-identity-need-to-be-strengthened-even-more/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:27

content: 在4月29日的梦想中,政府将采取的信息,这是一个免费的集会 - “俄罗斯游行”捍卫“俄罗斯法律”,这是在我们的耻辱,我们的政府正在保持在一个地方,这是一个象征的独立,独立,主权和自由格鲁吉亚的计划,他说Khatia Dekanoidze,一个代表“欧乐观主义者”举行的集会,告诉记者。她说,这是最大的咒,这是被迫,包括行政资源,来参加这个游行的地方,“我已经多次说过,这些行动不是由反对派组织的。这些宣传活动每天举行,我相信他们会继续。Bidzina Ivanishvili唯一想要面对格鲁吉亚的公民的法律。同样,首先,这是俄罗斯需要的资源,特别是在格鲁吉亚的独立公民,有我们的信息,格鲁吉亚人,特别是年轻人 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131081-khatia-dekanoidze-april-29-meeting-will-be-russian-march-to-protect-russian-law/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:27

title: 萨卡什维利:这不是普通的选举,我们不能以普通的方式行动 - 我们需要统一的名单,一切都应该推迟
content: 格鲁吉亚第三任总统米哈伊尔·萨卡什维利(Mikheil Saakashvili)说:“我们需要一个统一的名单,我们不能把一切都放在一边,我们需要一个统一的名单,将专业人士带到政府和那些可能不积极参与政治的人,但能够更好地领导国家的人,每个人都明白了这一点。目前,在欧洲议会举行新闻发布会,Zurababerashvili,我的母亲朱利亚(Alasania和欧盟议员)也站在她旁边。欧洲议会正在要求我的释放,不是因为这是我的事情,但这是关于普京永远不会离开的原则,当你把它带到俄罗斯时,你应该赢得很多,因为你不能把它带到监狱里。格鲁吉亚,如果没有任何意识,我肯定会在这里。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131083-mikheil-saakashvili-this-is-not-an-ordinary-election-and-we-cannot-act-in-an-ordinary-way-we-need-a-unified-list-everything-should-be-postponed/ 发布时间: 2024-04-25 17:07:26

title: 欧洲议会正在审议决议草案,要求制裁比迪扎娜·伊万尼什维利和支持该法案的议员
content: 欧洲联盟最近通过的草案草案草案,如果他们希望通过的欧洲联盟草案草案,将讨论对“格鲁吉亚梦”和比迪娜伊凡尼什维利法案的成员受到影响的永久性决议草案,并将于4月25日举行投票,该草案草案将被称为“试图重新提交有关格鲁吉亚的外国代理人和限制民间社会的立法草案”。草案草案将被上传到欧盟议会网站上。今天,4月23日,它计划讨论关于格鲁吉亚的立法草案的草案,其中格鲁吉亚高级代表欧盟,Josep Borrell,将与欧洲议会成员一起提交立法草案。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131046-the-european-parliament-is-considering-the-draft-resolution-in-which-it-is-requested-to-sanction-bidzina-ivanishvili-and-the-mps-supporting-the-draft-law/ 发布时间: 2024-04-24 13:49:25

title: 斯文·米克塞尔:格鲁吉亚是一个候选国,但如果通过“外国代理”法,它不应该期望能够成为欧盟的成员
content: 欧盟议员斯文·米克塞尔(Sven Mikser)表示,欧洲议员应在欧洲议会草案“透明度的外国影响”的辩论中表示,不幸的是,他认为格鲁吉亚政府正在变得越来越不自由和反欧盟。“格鲁吉亚的人口绝大多数在最近几年里看到他们的未来,格鲁吉亚政府,执政的政党“格鲁吉亚梦想”也表示希望加入欧盟。不幸的是,格鲁吉亚梦想的政府正在变得越来越不自由和反欧盟。不幸的是,在民主和法治方面,格鲁吉亚联盟的绝大多数人已经退缩。他们有基本的自由问题,司法系统的独立性,媒体自由的限制。与LGBTQ+权利的国家。欧盟议会和格鲁吉亚社会将根据其民事 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131048-sven-mikser-georgia-is-a-candidate-country-but-if-it-passes-the-foreign-agents-law-it-should-not-expect-to-be-able-to-become-a-member-of-the-eu/ 发布时间: 2024-04-24 13:49:25

title: 迈克尔·盖勒(Michael Galler):格鲁吉亚政府已经承担了一些义务,这些义务在重新引入法律时被明显违反 - 我们要求释放萨卡什维利,对伊万尼什维利实施制裁
content: 事实上,格鲁吉亚政府已经承担的义务,并在重启该法案时严重违反了这些义务。欧洲议员Michael Galler在欧洲议会全体会议上发表讲话时宣布了这一点。“有承诺格鲁吉亚政府已经承担,而这些承诺正在被公开地违反,重启该法案,但我的印象是,如果这是关于“外国特工”,唯一的“外国特工”参与者是那些在执政党中复制俄罗斯法律的人,他们正在推动俄罗斯的治理风格,也许是他们(俄罗斯)的名义。我看着总理Kobakhidze。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131049-michael-galler-there-are-obligations-that-the-government-of-georgia-has-taken-and-which-are-being-blatantly-violated-by-reintroducing-the-law-we-demand-the-release-of-saakashvili-and-the-imposition-of-sanctions-on-ivanishvili/ 发布时间: 2024-04-24 13:49:24

title: Petras Auštrevičius:我呼吁欧盟机构对Zviad Kharebashvili和Vazha Siradze实施制裁,这些人反对格鲁吉亚人民的意愿
content: 我呼吁欧盟机构对Zviad Kharebashvili和Vazha Siradze实施制裁,这些人正在反对格鲁吉亚人民的意愿。欧洲议员Petras Auštrevičius在欧洲议会全体会议上发表讲话时表示:“执政党的反复试图通过“西方影响力”引入法律是他们如何试图控制民间社会,影响媒体和即将举行的议会选举的例子。所有这一切都发生在格鲁吉亚作为欧盟候选国的地位的背景下。所谓的镇压性法律试图用“西方实践”来证明它是可悲的。这种法律是俄罗斯回归权威主义的关键。同时,我向反对这一决定的格鲁吉亚人民致敬。 这些活动家将保护西方国家的西方主义,反对未来的平和 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131050-petras-austrevicius-i-appeal-to-the-institutions-of-the-european-union-to-introduce-sanctions-against-zviad-kharebashvili-and-vazha-siradze-these-people-act-against-the-will-of-the-georgian-people/ 发布时间: 2024-04-24 13:49:24

title: 欧盟议员Miriam Lexmann:如果“关于外部影响透明度”的法律被通过反对格鲁吉亚人民的愿望和违反欧盟委员会的建议,那么我们的反应应该是明确的

title: Mamuka Mdinaradze:如果有人敢以制裁威胁人民选举的议员,这是可以想象的吗?

title: 古比利乌斯:格鲁吉亚加入欧盟的主要障碍不是格鲁吉亚人民,而是“格鲁吉亚梦想”政府
content: 首先,欧洲理事会的混合体是欧盟成员的能力,但它是明确的,格鲁吉亚政府已经提出了俄罗斯风格的“外国代理人”法案,以便故意扭转格鲁吉亚的道路到欧盟,欧洲议员安德鲁斯·库比利乌斯说,在欧洲议会的“外部影响的透明度”法案的辩论中,格鲁吉亚政府是绝对清楚的,因为它故意想向克里姆林宫展示,他们必须履行克里姆林宫的混合议程的法律秩序格鲁吉亚,任何决定,将导致加入欧盟的谈判,应该停止。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131053-andrius-kubilius-the-main-obstacle-on-georgias-path-to-the-eu-is-not-the-georgian-people-but-the-georgian-dream-government/ 发布时间: 2024-04-24 13:49:23

title: George Katcharava - The events of April 2024 determine future trends of global pollical and security architecture
content: Interpressnews spoke with George Katcharava, International Security and International Relations Specialist, on foreign policy related issues. Mr. Katcharava, after a 5-month delay, the US Congress with 311 votes approved USD 61 billion worth assistance package in support of Ukraine. The U.S. Senate on Tuesday is voting on this Congressional decision, and it is expected the same day the bill will land on President Biden's desk the final signature. It is already known that military equipment will be delivered step by step until December 31, 2024. After the assistance package will undergo all approval procedures, what aid will Ukraine receive from the United States? Adoption this aid package is a really important breakthrough given the current political situation in the United States. It would be fair to touch upon some intricacies that this whole process went through. I must say that delayed and stretched in time process has been conditioned to the crisis that Republican party is experiencing. This powerful and influential political force is deeply divided, and this has become even more evident in the light of the election year. Unfortunately, it appears that Ukraine assistance package approval process have fallen victim to the given circumstances within American political elite. Lately we have witnessed a very positive change in the position and attitude of House Speaker Mike Johnson, followed by the introduction of aid to Ukraine in the Congressional agenda. Of course, such a positive decision did not happen on its own. This is the result of a scrupulous and long-standing advocacy campaign of various influential and important groups on different platforms, using different forms and networks. Obviously, official information that high ranking officials are receiving through confidential channels has also contributed to the given outcome. Nonetheless the success of such a campaign, among others, was stipulated by revealing crimes and misconduct by the Russian forces towards peaceful population of Ukraine, especially concerning different religious groups. Make no mistake, this could not pass without notice and caused legitimate outrage among Evangelical Christian circles in the United States. Speaker Johnson as a deeply devoted Christian could not turn a deaf ear towards appalling situation. As a result of multifaceted and active advocacy, Speaker Johnson as well as good number of his fellow Republican members of house of Representatives chose the side of the light, even though such a choice could cost him a post. In addition, it was important to unite and engage politically active bipartisan groups in the mentioned process, who understand the cost of the war in Ukraine, for global security and stability, and how intertwined the issue is with the ongoing processes in other regions of the world. Therefore, this is an important and landmark decision that can bring instantly positive dynamics directly to the battlefield in Ukraine. Obviously, the bill should pass approval procedures in the Senate as well, but no one seems to expect any troubles within the Senate, as well as in terms of President Biden's signature on Thus, it is highly likely that the Ukraine assistance package will be launched as soon as possible, paving the way for the immediate weapons’ delivery.It should be well understood that USD 61 billion assistance package includes about USD 47 billion direct military aid. This is a huge resource that will contribute to a sharp improvement in Ukraine's defense capabilities, like air defense systems and ammunition, as well as armored vehicvles. But, in my opinion, the most important is that under this assistance U.S. will provide Ukraine with long-range missiles, which can play crucial role on the ground.In addition, let's not forget about the assistance European allies are providing, which includes fighter jets and additional air defense systems and a large number of artillery shells. Such an important and sizable assistance package which includes significant military part can have a substantial impact on the frontline. While the list of assistance items is quite impressive, the predictions of some military experts on how the processes will unfold on the battlefield look quite modest.I have in mind that most of them suggest that despite receiving weapons, the status quo will be maintained on the frontline of Ukraine-Russia war.How do you see developments in the battlefield of Russo-Ukrainian war? The ongoing fighting in Ukraine has long been transitioned into positional confrontation, or trench war, where Russia has the advantage at the moment, both in terms of ammunition and in terms of the number of troops. It also has to be said that Russia has some advantage in the air as well. All these factors combined contributed to some Russian advances that we have been witnessed lately.Under current circumstances, the assistance provided to Ukraine will first help stabilize the frontline, as well as strengthen the air defense system. In addition, by receiving a certain number of fighter jets, Ukraine will have the opportunity to better protect the country's airspace and prevent Russian air force from carrying out frontal operations.All these will create some prerequisite conditions for future successful operations for the Ukrainian military. Although, it is also worth noting that Ukraine managed to increase its military production, which reaches USD 20 billion annually, which is significant, since its able to produce ammunition, self-propelled artillery systems, not to mention that Ukraine produces 90% of needed high-tech drones. On the latter, it worth mentioning that Ukraine pioneered maritime drone warfare, becoming current leader in this area, assuring asymmetric strikes that pushed Black Fleet of Russian Federation to leave its naval basis in Crimea peninsula. We also see significant progress re airborne drones made using Artificial Intelligence technology. At the end we see that technologically Ukrainian military are advancing very rapidly and with international support can achieve substantial results. After Iran carried out strikes on Israel, the already complicated situation in the Middle East became even worse. Once Iran has carried out strikes on Israel, Israeli political and military leadership announced on the same day that Israel will respond to Iran, but on a later stage.Meanwhile, the U.S. has allocated USD 26 billion to help Israel. What did Iran's attack on Israel show? It is unequivocal that this was the first direct attack carried out by the Islamic Republic on Israel. Many aspects related to this very operation can be considered unprecedented. The Islamic Republic military forces appear to have carried out about 300 different types of aero ballistic projectiles launched against Israel.It is also worth noting that such an action by the Islamic Republic has shown that it has the ability to carry out such a large-scale operation. It should also be indicated that by carrying out such an act, the Islamic Republic showed its influence over the region, being able to launch missiles and drones against Israel from several countries in the region.On the other hand, United States in a very short period of time was able to compile coalition of allies, including Jordan and Saudi Arabia to counter the threats coming from Islamic Republic. Thus, Israeli Defense Forces, were aided by the U.S., the UK, Saudi Arabia and Jordan militaries that directly participated in the repulsion of the attack, jointly reaching unprecedented over 90 per cent destruction rate against air targets launched by Islamic republic.Facilitating establishment of such an ad-hoc coalition in a short period of time, especially given the tense situation in the region, including the existing unresolved issues among its members, clearly shows U.S. global leadership abilities.Therefore, as a matter of fact, reaction of regional actors as well as U.S. and U.K. coupled with demonstration of technological superiority sends a very clear message, that allied forces and their governments will do what it takes to prevent large-scale escalation and spillover of instability in the Middle East.At the same time, Saudi Arabia's actions have made its long-standing disagreement with the Islamic Republic apparent and have shown low tolerance for such actions, despite the agreement reached by China a few years ago.Such a development optimistically speaking could bring back discussions on the Abraham Accords, which was suspended as a result of Hamas' October 7 attack on Israel. Armenian Prime Minister Pashinyan stated that Armenia will hand over to Azerbaijan the villages that belonged to Azerbaijan before the collapse of the USSR. In addition, the process of demarcation of the border between Azerbaijan and Armenia began.In the wake of these events, the withdrawal of Russian peacekeeping forces from Karabakh began. After Azerbaijan fully restored Baku's jurisdiction over Karabakh, they should have left before, but their departure was announced only now.And this happens in a situation where the Russians wanted to establish control over the Zangezur corridor to Azerbaijan, but strong players asked Azerbaijan to refrain from conducting military operation on the Iran-Armenia border.Why Russia is withdrawing its troops from Karabakh now? Where will they likely go? I look at this issue in a simple manner, without any conspiracy. Russian troops have no function due to the situation on the ground that was established as of September 2023. In addition, Russia has a greater need for military forces elsewhere. This applies not only to the war theater in Ukraine, but also to the northwestern territories of the Russian Federation.As you know, after Finland and Sweden joined NATO, the decision has been made to restore Leningrad Military District. The main task for this new military structure should be, deterrence of the NATO forces, deployed near Russian borderline with Finland. Therefore, it is quite possible that the unit withdrawn from Karabakh will join the process of formation of the newly restored Leningrad military district.Of course, the above represents my personal assumption. Although, withdrawal of Russian troops is stipulated and attributed not only to lack of functionality, but also to the fact that Azerbaijani armed forces created such conditions on the ground, under which, presence of Russian troops would not have any sense.It should be noted that interesting processes are underway within the framework of the process of demarcation and delimitation of the Azerbaijan-Armenia border. As you know, through Armenian officials, it became known that Armenia is handing over to Azerbaijan four villages of Tavush region, since the territory legally belongs to Azerbaijan.This is undoubtedly worthy of a positive assessment, as representatives of the two countries managed and agreed on a territorial issue at the negotiating table for the first time. Although this covers a small section of the borderline, the trend for a peaceful resolution of disputed issues between the two neighboring countries is an important development for the region.Such approaches, in turn, reduce the likelihood of military confrontation, which will have a positive impact on regional peace and stability. If we go back to the Israeli topic, after the US made the decision to help Israel with USD 26 billion, the question is likely to be - when Israel will respond to the Iran’s attack.Is Israel's retaliatory response on Iran is to be expected? How high is the likelihood that the Israeli-Iranan confrontation will put the already fragile world in an even more difficult situation if Israel attacks Iran's nuclear facilities? Interesting question. A few days ago, Israeli military carried out a limited strike on facilities inside the territory of the Islamic Republic. There is very little information on this attack. As is known, strikes were carried out at military facilities located in the Isfahan and Tabriz areas. Apparently, reportedly the Russian-made S-300 type air defense system was destroyed.What is noteworthy regarding this operation? First of all, the Israeli side carried out an attack that was very limited in its scope. On the other hand, it appears that the missiles used by Israel, its launching point, as well as the military aircrafts that delivered said missiles were not detected by the air defense systems of the Islamic Republic.In addition, the targets and their location, selected by the Israeli Defense Forces, appears to be related to the Islamic Republic's nuclear program. According to expert opinions, this type of operation represents a warning message, in order to avoid undesirable consequences in the future. Therefore, perhaps this act can be viewed as Israel's response to the attack on the Islamic Republic.Such a limited scale Israeli response could have twofold justification. Firstly, the position of the United States and President Biden personally opposing full-scale Israeli retaliation. On the other hand, avoiding the threat of large scale military escalation in a very vulnerable region of Middle East.It seems both justifications were taken into account during preparation for the Israeli response as ut looks like a surgical intervention, as a result of which the message has reached the addressee and importantly regional destabilization and military escalation have also been avoided.InterpressnewsKoba Bendeliani 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131054-george-katcharava-the-events-of-april-2024-determine-future-trends-of-global-pollical-and-security-architecture/ 发布时间: 2024-04-24 13:49:22

title: 关于《外部影响透明度法案》的帕特尔(Vedant Patel):我们继续发现,这种立法活动极具问题,与欧盟的愿望不符
content: 我们继续发现这种类型的立法活动是非常有问题的,不符合欧盟的愿望, - 美国国务院首席副发言人Vedant Patel在一份关于“外部影响透明度”法案的简报中表示,“我们肯定支持在美国将是人民在第一修正案下和平抗议和示威的权利的表达。 我们的呼吁和我们的推动,当然,继续是,他们是和平的,当然会谴责采取的任何步骤,让这些类型的抗议变得暴力。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131055-vedant-patel-on-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-we-continue-to-find-that-this-kind-of-legislative-activity-to-be-deeply-problematic-and-inconsistent-with-eu-aspirations/ 发布时间: 2024-04-24 13:49:20

title: 佩特拉斯·奥斯特里维西乌斯:所谓的外国影响透明度法案与格鲁吉亚的候选国地位相矛盾,威胁着格鲁吉亚的欧洲道路
content: 它实际上不是一个欧洲的做法,我们没有要求格鲁吉亚这样做,所以它只是不是一个欧洲的方式前进。它与格鲁吉亚的候选人的地位相矛盾,对该国的欧洲道路构成威胁, - 欧洲议员彼得拉斯奥斯特雷维西乌斯在新闻发布会上说,这是致力于格鲁吉亚议会提出的“外部影响的透明度”法案的问题,而格鲁吉亚在提交这项法案的欧洲领导人的最佳做法。 根据他的说法,格鲁吉亚政府正在试图将该法案的通过呈现为一个欧洲的做法。 在欧盟,我们不试图控制非政府组织,就像“格鲁吉亚梦想”这样说,它应该与欧洲议会“不威胁它”,它是欧洲党的候选 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131036-petras-austrevicius-the-so-called-the-draft-law-on-the-transparency-of-foreign-influence-contradicts-georgias-candidate-status-and-threatens-the-countrys-european-path/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 21:24:21

title: 安娜·福蒂加:我们看到俄罗斯在格鲁吉亚的影响力扩散的尝试 - 人口大规模反对它,我们支持他们

title: 马莫卡·姆迪纳拉泽:如果有人想以放弃格鲁吉亚的国家利益为代价,在欧洲的道路上交易我们,这对任何人都不起作用,也不符合欧洲的真正利益
content: 它是不可想象的,如果他们要求我们释放萨卡什维利,欧洲一体化将受到阻碍,这是令人自豪的状况,我们不遵守的12条建议,然后它证明了我们正在履行这些建议,我们得到的候选人地位,同样的叙述仍然是今天。在这种争端和斗争的背景下,我们必须在欧洲的道路上前进, - 议会多数的领导人,执行秘书“格鲁吉亚梦想”,Mamuka Mdinaradze告诉记者,也许。Mdinaradze指出,贸易的代价,格鲁吉亚的国家利益仍然是今天。我们必须站在欧洲的真正利益的背景下,他也指出,我们如何加入谈判可能会延迟,但它将得到一些地位。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131038-mamuka-mdinaradze-if-someone-wants-to-trade-us-on-the-path-of-europe-at-the-expense-of-giving-up-the-national-interests-of-georgia-it-will-not-work-for-anyone-it-will-not-be-in-the-real-interest-of-europe/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 21:24:21

content: 尽管欧盟委员会被任命为最高理事会的现行宪法和明确的规定,包括在欧洲理事会的特殊情况下,他们在2013年提出了明确的规定,认为欧洲理事会的某些活动不尊重司法独立和其在政治上敏感的案件中的公正性。这在美国国务院立法机构发布的2023年最高公民权利法治报告中提到,“法官在法庭内部和法庭外都受到政治压力,在决定涉及政治上敏感的话题或个人的司法案件时,政府不尊重司法独立性。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131028-us-state-department-report-judges-vulnerable-to-political-pressure-when-deciding-cases-involving-politically-sensitive-topics-or-individuals/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 17:03:55

title: 四名嫌疑人因制作和发放假驾驶执照被捕
content: 根據格魯吉亞財務部調查服務員進行的操作搜查措施和調查行動,四人因製造和發行偽造文件而被逮捕,根據格魯吉亞財務部調查服務提供的信息,該罪行可懲罰3至6年徒刑,“調查發現,被告與同事一起,以550美元的價格製成並出售了格魯吉亞內政部服務機構的偽造駕駛證,以及對發行駕駛證的偽造報告。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131029-four-people-were-arrested-for-making-and-issuing-fake-driving-licenses/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 17:03:55

title: Shalva Papuashvili:格鲁吉亚的欧盟资金也是不透明的 - 我绝对相信Josep Borell没有阅读有关“外部影响透明度”的法案草案
content: 事实上,欧盟在格鲁吉亚的资金也是不透明的,“我绝对肯定没有读过这份法案,但欧洲议会主席Shalva Papuashvili在与记者交谈时说了这件事。正如帕布什维利指出的那样,秘密融资格鲁吉亚的激进团体和政党也是不透明的行为,“当我们谈论透明度法案时,我们应该知道,这是一个基于格鲁吉亚人民的利益的反法案。这可能不是在其他人的利益,特别是那些谁的资金来格鲁吉亚的确切方式,不透明,而不幸的是,内容的欧盟融资在格鲁吉亚也是不透明的行为。我们知道的例子,如“欧洲民主基金”,它隐藏了其在格鲁吉亚的资金,而不是其他人, 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131031-shalva-papuashvili-eu-funding-in-georgia-is-also-opaque-i-am-absolutely-sure-that-josep-borell-has-not-read-the-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 17:03:54

title: 沙尔瓦·帕布亚什维利(Shalva Papuashvili)关于美国国务院的报告:如果Kezerashvili在任何一份报告中呈现积极,那就是报告的问题
content: 當我們的部門的報導是基於這些報導,他們的報導顯示在美國國務院的報導,它是最不幸的報導,它發表在陰影 - 如果Kezerashvili在任何報導中呈現正面光,它是一個問題的報導, - 說這些報導,它是基於歐洲部門的報導,他們的報導顯示在報告中,它是虛假的報導,不幸的是,它發表在2023年美國國務院的人權報導的報導中。 與此同時,他回答了記者的問題,“如果他已經評估了這個事實,報導中提到“媒體權利擁護者一個特別的問題,他們表示,在格魯吉亞國防部和Kezerashvili之間的爭議是正面反射 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131032-shalva-papuashvili-on-the-report-of-the-us-state-department-if-kezerashvili-is-presented-positively-in-any-report-it-is-a-problem-of-the-report/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 17:03:54

title: Giorgi Vashadze:我向Ivanishvili,Kobakhidze,Mdinaradze发言 - 你为谁举行集会?你反对你自己的人民吗?你害怕,你软弱
content: 政府在强迫将公务员带到特比利斯并举行集会时,没有再表现出什么大弱点 - 你为谁举行集会?你自己的人民?你反对你自己的人民吗? - 这就是“格鲁吉亚梦”的领导人乔治·瓦沙泽(Giorgi Vashadze)向大多数成员表示的恐惧和弱点 - 政府在4月29日在议会宣布与“外国影响透明度”法案有关的公开会议时表示另一个大弱点 - 政府试图强行将公务员带到特比利斯并举行示威 - 主要问题是,谁在提倡? 我在党办公室举行的简报会上说,“格鲁吉亚梦”的成员很害怕和弱点。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131033-giorgi-vashadze-i-am-addressing-ivanishvili-kobakhidze-mdinaradze-who-are-you-holding-the-rally-for-are-you-going-against-your-own-people-you-are-afraid-you-are-weak/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 17:03:54

title: 沙尔瓦·帕布亚什维利:关于“外国影响透明度”的法案唯一伤害的是黑钱
content: 格鲁吉亚议会主席沙尔瓦·帕普亚什维利(Shalva Papuashvili)说,组织的“外界影响的透明度”法律草案只会伤害黑钱,“所以公众应该知道这一切”。“我们看到一场仇恨的运动,煽动各种团体的暴力,只是为了隐藏这笔钱。任何地方可能有黑钱,它都应该被披露。例如,事实证明“Droa”是由欧盟和美国通过EED资助的,没有人知道它,它没有任何地方可以看到。它被隐藏在公众面前,我们发现的只是偶然。例如,这个运动是由欧盟和美国资助的“Molotov鸡尾酒”的浪漫化,通过NED和EED,“Shame Movement”将像Molapuashvili一样说,每个人 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131034-shalva-papuashvili-the-only-thing-that-the-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-harms-is-black-money/ 发布时间: 2024-04-23 17:03:53

title: 国家旅游局:2024年第一季度对格鲁吉亚进行了938,644次旅游访问 - 与2019年的数据相比,增长为6.4%
content: 根据国家旅游局的数据,2024年第一季度在格鲁吉亚发生了938,644次旅游访问,比2023年增加了11%,与2019年的数据相比增加了6%,根据他们的说法,国际旅行者的数量在1月至3月期间达到1300万人,比去年同期增加了7%,这是2019年数字的80,4%的回收。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131010-national-tourism-administration-938644-tourist-visits-were-made-to-georgia-in-the-first-quarter-of-2024-compared-to-the-data-of-2019-the-increase-is-64/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:19

title: 格鲁吉亚梦:我们考虑到支持者的请求,4月29日,我们将在议会面前举行公开集会 - 我们将向每个人展示格鲁吉亚人民的多数地位
content: 格鲁吉亚梦是伟大的宗教和宗教信仰的国家和欧洲国家不信任的机构在4月29日的格鲁吉亚议会大楼前进行的一次公开会谈 - 格鲁吉亚梦发表的一份声明 - “关于真正的外国影响的透明度的法律草案仍然在考虑中。然而,已经很清楚,与去年不同的是,格鲁吉亚议会的传统反对派只能误导我们独立的公民的一小部分。在其峰值时,格鲁吉亚社会在政治反对派组织的公开集会的参与者数量已经达到9500人。 根据我们的社会价值观调查,我们今天的格鲁吉亚梦的透明度超过了60%的国家投资,而我们今天的格鲁吉亚梦的评级超过了60%的国家,而只有反对派们将在前线 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131011-georgian-dream-we-take-into-account-the-request-of-our-supporters-and-on-april-29-in-front-of-the-parliament-we-will-hold-a-public-gathering-we-will-show-everyone-where-the-majority-of-the-georgian-people-stand/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:18

title: 关于反对LGBT宣传的宪法修正案在库塔西进行的一般公开审查
content: 总体关注的部分是Spehibhers的总体公共审查是对LGBT宣传的宪法修正案的制定者。宪法法草案将由议会多数提交。“启动这一变化的基础是我们最近所观察到的趋势。正在发生的趋势在世界。我们的经验表明,在一定时间之后,宪法法草案将被提交到这里。这就是为什么我们必须建立我们的家庭价值观,”议会主席Shalva Papuashvili说:“在接下来的几天里,公众审查委员会将在Ambrolauri,Ozurgeti,Batumi,Zugdidi和Mestia举行讨论。议会主席Shalva Papuashvili将领导公共审查委员会。其新成员包括:Mamuka Mdinaradze,Rati Ionatamishvili,Irak Shatliashvili,Maka 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131012-general-public-review-of-constitutional-amendments-against-lgbt-propaganda-underway-in-kutaisi/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:18

title: Mamuka Mdinaradze:4月29日有一次会晤,将支持政府的政治方向,格鲁吉亚必须表明它支持透明度,禁止LGBT宣传,正确格鲁吉亚的方向
content: 4月29日,将举行一场支持政府政治进程的集会,格鲁吉亚必须表现出自己的力量,支持透明度、民族主义、禁止LGBT宣传和正确的格鲁吉亚强国方针, - 议会多数领导人Mamuka Mdinaradze就针对针对LGBT宣传准备的法案草案的总会议表示,Mamuka Mdinaradze表达了希望,全格鲁吉亚将支持这一方向,“4月29日,有一个会晤,将支持政府的政治进程,而格鲁吉亚必须表现出自己的力量,支持透明度,民族主义,禁止LGBT宣传和正确的格鲁吉亚强国方针,我们将依靠您的支持和全格鲁吉亚的支持,”Mamuka Minaradze说。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131013-mamuka-mdinaradze-on-april-29-there-is-a-gathering-that-will-support-the-governments-political-course-georgia-must-show-that-it-supports-transparency-the-ban-on-lgbt-propaganda-and-correct-georgian-course/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:17

title: 安里·奥哈纳什维利:不同生活方式不受限制,但在我国应该禁止促进LGBT问题
content: 我们的任务是限制我们的生活方式的权利,以提供我们社会的最大限度的信息,关于什么法律法规我们正在处理的, - 法律委员会限制主席安里奥哈纳什维利说,关于宪法修正案反对LGBT宣传的权利。 关于宪法草案法律“关于家庭价值观和保护未成年人”的公共讨论开始在库塔西,在那里安里奥哈纳什维利谈论反对派的抵制问题,并指出,它应该讲述他们的价值观。 根据他,不同的生活方式没有受到限制,但在我们国家的LGBT问题的宣传应该被禁止。 “你知道的,今天,我们正在开始关于宪法修正的一般公共讨论。 你知道的问题与禁止LGBT宣传的问题有关。 我们的任务是提供我们的社会的最大限度的信息,我们正在讨论什么样的法律法规 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131014-anri-okhanashvili-a-different-lifestyle-is-not-restricted-but-the-promotion-of-lgbt-issues-should-be-prohibited-in-our-country/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:17

title: Shalva Papuashvili:允许结婚的年龄 - 18岁 - 将写入宪法
content: 根据议会主席Shalva Papuashvili的说法,允许结婚的年龄,18岁,将在宪法中写入。Papuashvili在对LGBT宣传准备的宪法修正案的普遍公开审查期间发表了相关声明。“2017年,已经确认婚姻只是一个男女之间的联盟。现在发生的事情,随着这种变化,是一回事 - 其他国家也在他们的宪法中有这些条款,然而,他们创建了作为一种替代方案,所谓的民间伙伴关系协议,一种法律形式,事实上,将这个联盟置于相同的法律层面。该记录的目的是确保婚姻和家庭是宪法定义的,并且没有法律替代品被允许。同时,宪法婚姻年龄18年将建立。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131015-shalva-papuashvili-the-age-permitted-for-marriage-18-years-will-be-written-in-the-constitution/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:16

title: 尼卡·梅利亚:4月29日,我们将看到一场集会,具有激励和尴尬的行政资源,人们将不得不隐藏他们的脸,向格鲁吉亚的未来倾斜
content: 在4月29日,我们将看到一场集会,有动摇和尴尬的行政资源,将不得不隐藏他们的面孔,向格鲁吉亚的未来倾斜, - 阿哈利党副主席Nika Melia在回应由格鲁吉亚梦宣布的4月29日集会时说:“4月29日,我们将看到一场集会,有动摇和尴尬的行政资源,将不得不隐藏他们的面孔,向格鲁吉亚的未来倾斜……在过去和未来之间的斗争中,过去从未赢得过,没有人赢得了与他们的孩子对抗,”Melia在社交网络上写道。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131016-nika-melia-on-april-29-we-will-see-a-gathering-with-demotivated-and-embarrassed-administrative-resources-of-people-who-will-have-to-hide-their-faces-and-bow-down-to-the-future-of-georgia/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:16

title: 俄罗斯占领军在德尔比村附近非法逮捕两名格鲁吉亚公民
content: 国家安全局报道,俄罗斯占领部队代表非法逮捕了两名格鲁吉亚公民附近的达尔比村,卡雷利市,“收到有关上述事件的信息后,国家安全局激活了由欧盟监测任务运营的热线。关于另一个非法拘留事实的信息立即向日内瓦国际讨论的联合主席和国际合作伙伴报告。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131017-russian-occupation-forces-illegally-arrest-two-citizens-of-georgia-near-village-of-dirbi/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 17:54:15

title: 抗议外国影响透明度法草案的集会将于今天举行
content: 正如集会参与者宣布的那样,他们今天将在议会前举行集会,虽然时间目前尚不清楚,据年轻人称,他们不会停止抗议,直到政府撤销该法案。此外,根据集会的组织者,抗议活动将从今天开始在各个大学继续。作为组织者,学生将举行有关法案的会议和讨论。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131007-rally-against-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-to-be-held-today/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 13:51:50

title: 国家安全局:有关行动调查活动昨晚进行,未发现爆炸物或装置
content: 根据国家安全局发布的声明,国家安全局的反恐单位整夜开展相关行动调查活动,因实施特别反恐措施,未发现任何爆炸物或装置,“4月21日,在社交网络、特别是电报互联网应用中传播的有关爆炸装置和预计袭击教育机构和购物中心的报道中,国家安全局的反恐单位整夜开展相关行动。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131008-state-security-service-the-relevant-operative-investigative-activities-were-carried-out-last-night-no-explosive-substance-or-device-has-been-found/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 13:51:50

title: 公民们在议会聚集反对法案“关于外部影响的透明度”
content: 抗议法案“关于外部影响的透明度”继续。公民再次聚集在立法机构. 活动的参与者将从立法机构到最高法院今天游行,从明天起,抗议活动将继续在各种大学。 作为活动的组织者解释,学生将举行会议和讨论法案,包括讨论将举行在大学的庭院。 信息,在蒂比利斯,行动反对法案“关于外部影响的透明度”发起的“格鲁吉亚梦想” - “没有俄罗斯法律”开始于4月15日,议会的法律事务委员会开始审议法案后。 该法案由格鲁吉亚议会在4月17日的第一次阅读中通过的抗议和批评。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131003-citizens-are-gathering-against-the-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-at-the-parliament/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 02:00:29

title: 在议会面前的行动:“不对俄罗斯法律”正在进行中
content: 名为“不对俄罗斯法律”的行动正在格鲁吉亚议会附近进行。集会的参与者在喊道:“不对俄罗斯法律!和欧洲”。此外,在集会期间播放了国歌。行动的参与者今天将从立法机构向最高法院游行,从明天起,抗议活动将继续在各种大学中进行。随着活动的组织者解释,学生将举行有关该法案的会议和讨论。正如组织者指出的那样,行动将持续到执政小组撤回“关于外国影响的透明度”法案的草案为止。为了信息,在蒂比利斯,对“格鲁吉亚梦”发起的“外国影响的透明度”法案的抗议活动 - “不是俄罗斯法案”于4月15日开始,议会法律事务委员会开始审议该法案后。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131004-the-action-in-front-of-the-parliament-no-to-the-russian-law-is-underway/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 02:00:28

title: 塞尔吉·卡帕纳兹对加哈巴什维利的声明:这是对欧洲方向的公开拒绝
content: “这是今天的格鲁吉亚梦”,所以伊万尼什维利自己不准备好加入欧盟,也不愿意,所以我们不应该允许他们改变国家的道路, - 塞尔吉Kapanadze,国家分析中心的创始人,GRASS,指出这一点。Kapanadze回答了“格鲁吉亚梦”主席伊拉克利Gharibashvili的声明:“今天的下一步是加入欧盟”,“我们还没有准备好加入欧盟”,“欧盟本身也没有准备好扩张”。据Kapanadze的说法,这个声明是公开拒绝欧盟的方向。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131005-sergi-kapanadze-on-gharibashvilis-statement-this-is-an-open-rejection-of-the-european-course/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 02:00:28

title: 集会的参与者向最高法院游行:他们大喊“不对俄罗斯法律,对欧洲是”,“不对离岸法律”
content: 与议会抗议“对外国影响透明度”法案的集会参与者正在向最高法院游行,据组织者称,可能有某种挑衅,所以集会的参与者被敦促不跟随这种挑衅。鲁斯塔维利大道目前关闭。在集会期间,参与者喊道:“不对俄罗斯法律!对欧洲是的”“不对离岸法律”。为了信息,格鲁吉亚议会于4月17日通过了“对外国影响透明度”法案,此前举行了3天的喧嚣委员会和会议讨论。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131006-the-participants-of-the-rally-march-towards-the-supreme-court-they-chant-no-to-russian-law-yes-to-europe-no-to-offshore-law/ 发布时间: 2024-04-22 02:00:26

title: 安德鲁斯·库比利乌斯关于加里巴什维利的声明 - 谁不准备加入欧盟,格鲁吉亚人民或“格鲁吉亚梦”? - 答案是明确的
content: 谁确切地不准备加入欧盟,格鲁吉亚人民或“格鲁吉亚梦”党?答案是明确的, - 这就是欧洲议会成员Andrius Kubilius如何回应“格鲁吉亚梦”主席伊拉克利Gharibashvili的声明,格鲁吉亚不准备加入欧盟。“在12月,Gharibashvili庆祝格鲁吉亚的欧盟候选人地位,并称之为胜利。4个月后,他说格鲁吉亚没有准备好。谁确切地没有准备好:格鲁吉亚人民或“格鲁吉亚梦”党?答案是明确的 -“格鲁吉亚梦”强加俄罗斯风格的法律,和亲欧人民在街头抗议,“欧洲议员在X社交网络上写道。提醒你,所以“格鲁吉亚梦” 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131001-andrius-kubilius-on-gharibashvilis-statement-who-is-not-ready-to-join-the-european-union-georgian-people-or-georgian-dream-the-answer-is-clear/ 发布时间: 2024-04-21 17:00:07

title: 集会 - “没有俄罗斯法律”在鲁斯塔维利大道上举行
content: 一场名为“没有俄罗斯法律”的青年集会正在鲁斯塔维利大道的议会附近举行。“妇女游行”的参与者也在立法机构面前参加集会。他们从共和国广场开始游行,在议会结束。鲁斯塔维利大道被封锁。年轻人昨晚从司法院游行到英雄广场。在游行期间,汽车司机向集会参与者表示支持。集会的参与者抗议了“关于外国影响的透明度”的法案草案,并喊道:“不对俄罗斯政权”、“欧洲联盟万岁”,“格鲁吉亚万岁”。根据他们的说法,他们不会停止抗议,直到执政党撤销上述法案。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130999-rally-no-russian-law-taking-place-on-rustaveli-avenue/ 发布时间: 2024-04-21 02:00:13

content: 聚集在议会大楼前的年轻人正在向总统政府游行,尚不清楚他们将在上述地点之后去哪儿,他们将告知集会的参与者在路上计划。根据组织者,可能会有某种挑衅。他们呼吁集会的参与者谨慎。此外,根据他们的信息,集会的组织者已经联系了总统政府,萨洛米·苏拉比什维利可能出来见他们。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/131000-young-protesters-marching-from-parliament-to-administration-of-president/ 发布时间: 2024-04-21 02:00:10

title: 帕塔·曼吉加拉泽:我们应该拒绝俄罗斯的“驾驶执照”并获得“欧洲驾驶执照”
content: “除了格鲁吉亚梦,它限制了格鲁吉亚加入欧盟的法律的前景,这不是由任何反对派领导人说,但它是由欧洲最高选举官员,从查尔斯·米歇尔开始,结束了与北约秘书长的公式,我认为这些人说,如果它适用于我们的合作伙伴,它将限制我们的合作伙伴在格鲁吉亚的运营,它会像俄罗斯一样,当它会让许多俄罗斯人成长为民主国家时,它不会成为欧洲联盟的成员,不应该面对欧洲联盟的第二个法律,如果它不是由任何反对派领导人说,但它是由欧洲最高选举官员,从查尔斯·米歇尔开始,并结束与北约秘书长的公式。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130996-paata-manjgaladze-we-should-refuse-the-russian-drivers-license-and-get-a-european-drivers-license/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 23:00:18

content: 一个“纳粹”是一个“纳粹”,一个女人是一个女人,一个男人是一个男人,这是简单的,这是不可能想的, - 说MamukaMdinaradze,议会多数的领导者. 根据他,它不重要的是,有多少部分的反对派分裂,因为根据Mdinaradze,他们有一个共同的过去,共同的现在和未来与“有害的计划”。 “六,九五十七,不管它叫什么,一个“纳粹”是一个“纳粹”。 他们有一个共同的过去,他们有一个共同的现在与恶意的计划,他们有一个共同的未来,也有恶意的计划。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130994-mamuka-mdinaradze-a-natsi-is-a-natsi-they-are-murderers-in-essence-they-started-pulling-down-the-posters-with-qr-codes-so-that-people-wouldnt-read-the-law/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 23:00:16

content: 它带领政府和国家机构通过政府的措施是明确的选举法草案,格鲁吉亚梦想是否需要把这个国家变成一个地方的洗钱黑色,刑事钱的命令Bidzina伊万尼什维利和克里姆林宫的法律应该占领这一事实 - 这表明,就像所有国家机构,议会的多数已经变成一个机构的快速服务这个国家的俄国寡头和俄罗斯的利益, - 说安娜纳茨维利什维利,在她的估计,该问题不低于一个严重打击公共服务的法律草案“关于外国影响的透明度”,格鲁吉亚梦想已经变成一个机构对这个国家的主权和每个这些公民的未来。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130995-ana-natsvilishvili-with-the-offshore-law-georgian-dream-wants-to-turn-this-country-into-a-place-for-laundering-criminal-money-by-order-of-bidzina-ivanishvili-and-the-kremlin/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 23:00:16

content: 今天,他从西方的观点中引入了一个非常具体的要求,但在西方的观点中,他引入了一个非常特殊的要求 - 撤回法律,并承担责任的执法者说,他们可能对抗抗议者进行非法行动, - Giorgi Vashadze,领导者欧洲战略建设者,他意识到,他在欧洲范式组织的会议后,他提出了一个非常特殊的要求 - 根据他,执政党,通过启动和提议法案,将采取一个步骤,对权威主义,其主要目标是从西方世界中脱离国家的法律,今天有一个非常具体的要求 - 撤回法律到西方世界他自己,他将不会失去在前沿的支持,而那些执法者谁有必要保护我们的国家利益。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130998-giorgi-vashadze-today-there-is-a-very-specific-demand-to-withdraw-the-law-and-hold-accountable-those-law-enforcers-who-committed-illegal-actions-against-the-protesters/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 23:00:14

content: 格鲁吉亚梦会主席伊拉克利·加里巴什维利(Irakli Gharibashvili)说:“格鲁吉亚民族运动的代表怎么能和我谈谈欧洲一体化?屠夫怎么能和我谈谈人权?格鲁吉亚梦会主席伊拉克利·加里巴什维利(Irakli Gharibashvili)解释说,在6个月内,全国将有选举,反对派应该做好准备。“反对派的计划,他们的计划和目标是毁灭,更多的混乱,焦虑和战争。这些人不是独立的演员,演员或政治家,他们是,让我们直接说,其他国家的利益的承包商,他们没有自己的利益,我们国家的利益对他们很陌生,他们不承认我们人民的利益,我不会从他们那里得到任何批评,国家运动 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130990-irakli-gharibashvili-how-can-a-representative-of-the-national-movement-talk-to-me-about-european-integration-they-used-brooms-against-young-people/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 20:00:03

content: 作为候选国,格鲁吉亚应该专注于让格鲁吉亚更接近欧盟的步骤,而不是远离欧盟的步骤, - 爱沙尼亚总理卡哈拉斯在她的个人推特页面上写道:“欢迎格鲁吉亚的新大使哈马什里德兹。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130986-kaja-kallas-as-a-candidate-country-georgia-should-focus-on-steps-moving-georgia-closer-to-the-eu-not-further-from-it/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 14:00:08

title: 抗议者宣誓不允许政府通过有关外国影响透明性的法律
content: “我们,格鲁吉亚的公民,格鲁吉亚的爱国者,已经聚集在这里,在英雄广场,以纪念他们的记忆,并在他们的灵魂面前起誓,我们发誓,我们永远不会放弃他们生命的代价获得的自由!我们发誓,我们永远不会和试图把我们的国家交给我们的敌人俄罗斯的力量和解。我们将站在一起,保护格鲁吉亚的国家地位,我们的语言,我们的财产和团结!我们发誓,发誓,发誓!独立和团结的格鲁吉亚万岁!” - 欧洲学生们在英雄广场上读到上述的誓言,之后,他们提出了格鲁吉亚的民族抗议。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130987-protesters-take-oath-to-not-allow-government-pass-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 14:00:08

title: 年轻人今天再次在议会面前举行集会
content: 年轻人将于4月20日晚上7点再次在议会面前举行集会。据他们介绍,他们不会停止抗议,直到政府撤回法案草案“关于外国影响的透明度”。“我们将继续战斗。学生,Ome out,讲师,出来,每个人。这个国家是我们的,我们没有什么可失去。长寿格鲁吉亚。没有协调,每个人都出现在自己的倡议上,有自己的思想,有自己的灵魂和心脏。我们不会回家,直到这个政府撤回这个丑陋的法案,我们会在这里直到那时,”年轻人说。学生从司法院到英雄广场上游行。上周晚,在游行期间,汽车司机向集会参与者发出信号。集会的参与者对抗议法案草案“关于外国影响的透明度”发表了 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130988-young-people-to-hold-rally-in-front-of-parliament-again-today/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 14:00:08

title: 查尔斯·米歇尔:我想明确地说,议会正在投票的法案不会让格鲁吉亚更接近欧盟,反之亦然。
content: 如果候选国投票支持不符合基本原则和价值观的法案,这将对加入进程产生影响,欧洲理事会主席查尔斯米歇尔在与Euronews的对话中表示:“我想明确地说:正在议会投票的法案草案不会使格鲁吉亚更接近欧盟,恰恰相反。我们对这个政府做出这一决定感到失望,”米歇尔说。谈到格鲁吉亚的欧盟加入进程是否会因这个有争议的法案而被冻结,米歇尔指出,任何违反欧盟标准的决定“将对布鲁塞尔如何评估候选国的机会产生影响。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130984-charles-michel-i-want-to-say-clearly-that-the-draft-law-that-is-being-voted-on-in-the-parliament-does-not-bring-georgia-closer-to-the-european-union-it-is-the-opposite/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 02:00:03

title: 街道被封锁在议会附近,那里正在举行抗议法案“关于外部影响的透明度”
content: 格鲁吉亚议会前的抗议活动的参与者封锁了鲁斯塔维利大道上的道路,抗议法案草案“关于外国影响的透明度”并喊道:“不对俄罗斯政权”,“欧洲联盟万岁”,“格鲁吉亚万岁”。据他们说,他们不会停止抗议,直到执政党撤回上述法案。根据集会的参与者,他们打算从鲁斯塔维利大道游行到司法院。根据行动的组织者之一,学生运动“Dafion”的成员Zviad Tshekladze的说法,他们的目标是增加年轻人的指控,并进一步深化他们对“外国影响的透明度”法案的意识。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130985-the-road-was-blocked-near-the-parliament-where-the-protest-against-the-draft-law-on-transparency-of-foreign-influence-is-taking-place/ 发布时间: 2024-04-20 02:00:03

title: SSSG报告:2023年,向占领的阿布哈兹方向的热线被激活了374次,向占领的茨金瓦利方向 - 1585次
content: 在2023年,即時報導,所以在右派被佔領的阿布哈茲運動的熱線被啟動374次,並在被佔領的Tskhinvali方向 - 1,585次 - 這是根據國家安全服務的年度報告Gali,已經提交給議會的報導。根據SSSG,格魯吉亞國家安全服務積極使用的“熱線”通過歐盟邊境觀察任務進行的事件記錄在佔領線和其周邊地區。根據他們的信息,在2023年,在日內瓦舉行了三次國際討論會議,其中國家安全服務的代表,在任務範圍內,強調從非法佔領中產生的危險,關注在安全方面。其中,注意力集中在人權的嚴重侵犯,非法拘留,所以會議的 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130968-sssg-report-in-2023-the-hotline-in-the-direction-of-occupied-abkhazia-was-activated-374-times-and-in-the-direction-of-occupied-tskhinvali-1585-times/ 发布时间: 2024-04-19 16:49:47

title: Geostat:在2024年1月至3月,从格鲁吉亚出口的货物量为132600万美元,比去年相应的指标减少了9.3%
content: 从格鲁吉亚出口的货物量在2024年1月至3月(没有未申报的出口)是132600万美元,比去年相应的指标下降了93%。有关此事的信息是由国家统计局分发的。根据他们的报告,在同一时期,本地出口(不再出口)占总出口的457%。与前一年相比,上述指标下降了21%和达到60560万美元。相当于美元。“在2024年1月至3月,十大国家在格鲁吉亚总国内出口的份额为71.8百万美元。在这方面,最大的出口伙伴是:俄罗斯(132100万美元),土耳其(8230万美元)和中国(5650万美元)。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130969-geostat-in-january-march-2024-the-volume-of-goods-exported-from-georgia-amounted-to-13260-million-us-dollars-which-is-93-less-than-the-corresponding-indicator-of-last-year/ 发布时间: 2024-04-19 16:49:47

title: SSSG:2023年,占领的茨金瓦利地区的吞并问题仍然是一个重大威胁,因为根据俄罗斯的说法,占领地区成为俄罗斯的一部分的主体在一定时间内仍然活跃。
content: 根据俄罗斯的说法,俄罗斯占领地区成为俄罗斯的一部分占领地区的主题仍然是时不时地活跃的, - 这在2023年国家安全局的报告中说,这是已经提交给议会的俄罗斯公民,并认为自己是俄罗斯的“一部分”。根据他们的解释,所谓的“联合奥塞梯”占领地区对俄罗斯联邦的财务依赖是一个特别重要的因素,就占领区域成为俄罗斯的一部分。“所谓的总统阿兰·加格洛耶夫表示,占领地区的大多数人口是俄罗斯公民,并认为自己是俄罗斯的“一部分”。所谓的“联合奥塞梯”党提出了“整合”的问题,在俄罗斯杜马和总统政府举行的会议上。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130970-sssg-in-2023-the-issue-of-the-annexation-of-the-occupied-tskhinvali-region-remained-a-significant-threat-because-according-to-russia-the-subject-of-the-occupied-region-becoming-part-of-russia-was-still-active-for-a-certain-period-of-time/ 发布时间: 2024-04-19 16:49:47

content: 美国国务院副发言人帕特尔(Vedant Patel)在一份关于《外国影响透明度法案》的简报中表示:“我们仍然深感关切,这种立法草案如果出台,可能会对旨在改善格鲁吉亚境内活跃的格鲁吉亚公民和媒体组织的生活而工作的民间社会组织造成耻辱,“我们认为,民间社会、新闻、媒体组织是任何民主社会的基石,我们敦促格鲁吉亚政府注意警告,该法案不符合欧盟的规范和价值观,而且肯定会对格鲁吉亚在欧盟道路上的进展产生负面影响。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130966-vedant-patel-we-remain-deeply-concerned-that-this-draft-legislation-similar-laws-are-used-by-the-kremlin-and-other-repressive-governments-to-systematically-repress-civil-society-and-the-media/ 发布时间: 2024-04-19 11:59:20

title: 乌克兰外交部:伊拉克利·科巴希兹在羞辱的背景下使用我们国家的名字进一步损害了格鲁吉亚 - 乌克兰关系。
content: 俄罗斯化,不是神话中的“乌克兰化”,是对格鲁吉亚的真正威胁,读乌克兰外交部发布的声明,该机构对格鲁吉亚发生的事件作出回应,“我们呼吁所有利益相关者尊重格鲁吉亚公民的和平抗议权利,并通过建设性对话寻求解决局势的权利。保护公民的权利和自由,以及民间社会参与解决社会重要问题,是建立一个亲欧国家的未来所必需的条件。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130959-ukraines-foreign-ministry-the-use-of-our-countrys-name-in-a-humiliating-context-by-irakli-kobakhidze-further-harms-georgian-ukrainian-relations-russification-not-the-mythical-ukrainization-is-the-real-threat-to-georgia/ 发布时间: 2024-04-19 11:59:20

title: 马修·米勒:我们对格鲁吉亚议会决定推进克里姆林宫启发的“外国影响”立法感到严重失望
content: 美国国务院发言人马修·米勒(Matthew Miller)在一份声明中表示,我们对格鲁吉亚议会决定推进克里姆林宫启发的“外国影响”立法感到严重失望。据他介绍,美国与其欧洲盟友一道,敦促格鲁吉亚不通过该法案。“我们对格鲁吉亚议会决定推进克里姆林宫启发的“外国影响”立法感到严重失望。正如欧盟所说,通过该法案可能会损害格鲁吉亚在其欧盟道路上的进展。我们与我们的欧洲盟友一道,敦促格鲁吉亚不制定违反绝大多数格鲁吉亚公民意愿的立法――完全融入欧盟的愿望。格鲁吉亚的目标是一个充满活力的民间社会,为其公民服务, 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130961-matthew-miller-we-are-gravely-disappointed-by-the-georgian-parliaments-decision-to-advance-kremlin-inspired-foreign-influence-legislation/ 发布时间: 2024-04-19 11:59:20

content: 虽然欧盟政府对西方国家采取了强有力的协议,欧盟政府对西方国家采取了强有力的协议:Bidzina Ivanishvili,使用侵略性议会团体和暴力警察部队,试图破坏格鲁吉亚的欧洲未来法案,该法案被格鲁吉亚人民的团结、坚定、强有力的、团结的格鲁吉亚社会所反对,格鲁吉亚人民的共同声明是“要成为欧盟和北约的全会员”的共同声明,“最近几天,我们再次试图看到格鲁吉亚民族完全团结,对自己的选择充满信心,为自由而斗争的精神,全格鲁吉亚人民的民主主义和全格鲁吉亚人民的政治选择是我们所面临的。 源文来自: https://www.interpressnews.ge/en/article/130955-opposition-parties-the-frightened-russian-oligarch-bidzina-ivanishvili-using-an-aggressive-parliamentary-group-and-a-violent-police-unit-is-trying-to-kill-the-european-future-of-georgia/ 发布时间: 2024-04-19 11:59:21
